eng_prompt: As we gather for the upcoming event, it's important to prioritize the health and safety of all participants. Ensuring proper hygiene and preventive measures will be essential.
lug_prompt: Nga tukungaana ku mukolo ogujja, kya mugaso okukulembeza obulamu n'obukuumi bw'abo bonna abeetabamu. Okukakasa obuyonjo n'enkola eziziyiza bijja kuba bikulu.
ach_prompt: Ka watye ka gure pi yub matye kabino ni, pire tek tutwal me keto cwiny I kom yotkom ki ber bedo pa dano weng matye I yub eni. Gwoko lengo ki gengo two bibedo gin ma pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Neautar sio atukonokin kanuka epucit lo ebunit, ejokuna aisingarenit angaleu keda ayuwara naka itunga kere luejaikina toma. Aimaniman nuka aila ka aitikitik adekasinei erai ibore yenepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Amani ama okuzu omu emupi 'disi, eri orodriru 'ba dria emupi 'diyi ma rua ala azini ageitema ma e'yo 'du okori'i. E'yo alata ni 'diyi ma tambazu azini geri e'yo eyi atrizu 'diyi ma tambazu 'diyi nga ovu orodriru.
nyn_prompt: Obu turikukwatanisa aha mukoro ogurikwija, n'eky'omugasho kwebembeza amagara n'oburinzi bw'abantu boona abarikukwejumbamu. Okureeba ngu hariho obuyonjo n'emitendera y'okuzibira, nikiija kuba eky'omugasho.

eng_prompt: Maintaining proper hygiene and sanitation is essential for public health. A well-kept environment plays a crucial role in reducing the spread of harmful pathogens.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma obuyonjo kya mugaso eri obulamu bw'abantu. Embeera ennungi ekola kinene nnyo mu kukendeeza okusaasaana kw'obuwuka obw'obulabe.
ach_prompt: Gwoko lengo obedo gin ma pire tek pi yot kom pa lwak. Kabedo ma orumuwa ma ki gwoko maber konyo tutwal me gengo nya pa kwidi ma kelo peko i kom dano.
teo_prompt: Aidar aila ka aila ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka angaleu naka itunga. Aiboisio nu idaritai ejok iswamaete ibore yenepol noi kanu aitidisiar awea na adekasinei nu erono.
lgg_prompt: Alata ma tambaza kililiru ri eri orodriru o'bi eyi ma rua ala ni. Angu ama agei ri ma ta mbaza kililiru ri ni azi okporu nga e'yo azo onzi 'diyi ma ereta ma omgbo esizu.
nyn_prompt: Okugumizamu n'obuyonjo n'eky'omugasho aha magara g'abantu. Eby'obuhangwa ebirikwetorwa kurungi, nibikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kukyendeeza okujanjaara kw'oburwaire.

eng_prompt: Adhering to medical advice is crucial for effective treatment and recovery. Therefore, it is essential for patients to understand and comply with their doctor's recommendations.
lug_prompt: Okukolera ku magezi g'abasawo kya nkizo mu bujjanjabi obulungi n'okuwona. N'olwekyo, kikulu nnyo abalwadde okutegeera n'okugoberera ebiragiro by'abasawo baabwe.
ach_prompt: Lubu tam pa daktar pire tek tutwal pi nongo yat ki cang maber. Pi meno, pire tek tutwal pi lutwo me niang ki lubu cik pa daktar gi.
teo_prompt: Atupite aicoreta nuka imurok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu amukian ka angaleun. Kanuka ngun, ejokuna noi adekak amisikin ka aitup aicoreta nuka imurok kec.
lgg_prompt: Imbata arojo ni 'diyi ma vuti obizu ri eri orodriru aro esuzu kililiru azini atita esuzu. Ka'dini, eri orodriru 'ba azoru 'diyi dri vata esuzu azini azita dakitari yini 'diyi ma vuti obizu.
nyn_prompt: Okukuratira obuhabuzi bw'abashaho n'eky'omugasho omu kuragurirwa kurungi n'okukira. N'ahabw'ekyo, n'eky'omugasho abarwaire kwetegyereza n'okukuratira ebiragiro by'abashaho baabo.

eng_prompt: The well-being of individuals directly impacts the strength of society as a whole. When people thrive in their health and happiness, the entire nation flourishes.
lug_prompt: Obulungi bw'abantu kinnoomu bukosa butereevu amaanyi g'ekitundu okutwaliza awamu. Abantu bwe bakulaakulana mu bulamu bwabwe n'essanyu, eggwanga lyonna likulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Rwom me kwo pa dano acel acel tye ki adwoki ne I kom teko pa lwak. Ka dano tye ma komgi yot dok cwiny gi yom, lobo weng dongo.
teo_prompt: Aijar najokan naka itunga itodolikini agogong naka itunga kere. Arai epoloete itunga kotoma angaleukec keda aiyalama, epoloete akwap kere.
lgg_prompt: Aa'ta muke 'ba alu alu ni ri ni okpo ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma omgbo otu. O'bi ka yi ma rua ala azini ayikosi, kari dria ni zo.
nyn_prompt: Emituurire mirungi y'abantu, neekora aha magara g'abantu boona. Abantu ku barikutunguuka omu magara gaabo n'okushemererwa, eihanga ryona niritunguuka.

eng_prompt: Taking proactive measures in healthcare is essential for maintaining overall well-being. By focusing on early detection and intervention, we can significantly reduce the risk of serious health issues.
lug_prompt: Okukola amangu mu byobulamu kya mugaso mu kukuuma obulamu obulungi okutwalira awamu. Bwe tussa essira ku kuzuula amangu n'okuyingira mu nsonga, tusobola okukendeeza ennyo ku bulabe bw'ebizibu by'ebyobulamu eby'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Timo jami mapud kare pe oromo I tenge me yot kom pire tek tutwal pi gwoko ber bedo pa dano. Ka waketo cwiny I kom niang ki timo gin mo con, watwero dwoko piny rwom me nongo peko me yot kom.
teo_prompt: Aingarakin kotoma amukian erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar aijar najokan. Kowai lo aibwaikin agogongu kanu ajenun adekasinei sek, ipedori oni aitidisiar atiokisio nuka adekasinei nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo mbele mbele 'diyi 'duzu e'yo alata ni 'diyi ma alea ri eri orodriru aa'ta muke ri ma tambazu. Asi 'bazu e'yo 'bani esu drioru azini e'yo 'yezu drioru ri ma dria, ama eco e'yo ewaru e'yo rua ala ni onzi 'diyi ni 'diyi ma omgbo esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Okukora ebirikwetengyesa omu by'amagara n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda amagara marungi. Twaguma nitufayo aha kukyebera bukiri kare, nitubaasa kukyendeeza munonga akabi k'oburwaire bw'amaani.

eng_prompt: In a well-functioning society, rules and regulations are established to maintain order and protect citizens. These guidelines serve as a framework to ensure fairness and justice for all individuals.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu ekikola obulungi, amateeka n'ebiragiro biteekebwawo okukuuma emirembe n'obukuumi bwa bannansi. Ebigobererwa bino bikola ng'omusingi okulaba nga wabaawo obwenkanya n'obwenkanya eri abantu bonna.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma kwo tye maber, kiketo cik me gwoko kuc ki ber bedo pa anywali. Cik magi tye macalo yoo me neno ni dano weng tye ki ber bedo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet na iswamai ejok, itemonokino ikisila ka ainapeta kanu aidar ainapakina ka ayuarite itunga. Iswamaete aicoreta nu kwape ainapeta nuka awanyun ebe ejai aipuga keda etube loajokan kanuka itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu azi ngapi muke 'diyi ma alea, 'ba azita eyi o'ba azita kari anzi eyi ma ta mbazu. Azita 'diyi azi nga ekile geri azi ngazu kililiru azini e'yo liza kililiru 'diyi fezu 'ba dria yi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu kicweka ekirikukora kurungi, ebiragiro n'ebiragiro nibiteebwaho okurinda n'okurinda abatuuragye. Obuhabuzi obu nibukora nk'omuringo gw'okureeba ngu hariho oburinganiza n'oburingaaniza ahabantu boona.

eng_prompt: A thriving job market is essential for financial stability and growth. When individuals are gainfully employed, they have more disposable income to spend and invest.
lug_prompt: Akatale k'emirimu akagenda mu maaso kalungi nnyo mu by'enfuna n'okukulaakulana. Abantu bwe baba n'emirimu egivaamu ssente, baba n'ensimbi nnyingi ze basobola okusaasaanya n'okusiga ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Cuk me tic ma tye maber obedo gin ma pire tek pi dongo lobo. Ka ngat moni tye ki tic maber, en bedo ki cente madwong me tic kwede.
teo_prompt: Aswam na ejok ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu ainapakina keda apol. Arai ejaasi itunga keda aswamisinei nu iswamaete ejok, ejaasi kesi keda ikapun luipu luepedorete kesi aitosom keda aipikakin ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Cu azi eyini tupi muke ri eri orodriru e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma tambazu tualu zota be. Ba ka ovu azi be orodriruni be, yi vu robia ayuzaru azini lonyi vuti alezuri angiri.
nyn_prompt: Obutare bw'emirimo burungi n'obw'omugasho ahabw'entatsya n'entunguuka. Abantu ku barikutunga emirimo erikubareetera amagoba, baine esente nyingi z'okukoresa n'okuzitaho.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive job market, fostering a positive workplace culture is essential for retaining talent. One key aspect of this is ensuring that employees feel valued and supported.
lug_prompt: Mu katale k'emirimu ak'ennaku zino akavuganya, okutumbula empisa ennungi ku mirimu kya mugaso mu kusigaza ebitone. Ekimu ku bikulu mu kino kwe kulaba ng'abakozi bawulira nga ba muwendo era nga bawagirwa.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma pyem tye matek tutwal I kom tic, dongo kit me kwo maber I gang tic pire tek tutwal pi gwoko dano matye ki diro. Gin acel ma pire tek me timo man obedo neno ni lutic giwinyo ni pigi tek dok ki cwakogi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka aswamisinei ilolo, aitopolor eipone loajokan loka aswam ejok kanu aidar atalantan. Adiopet koboro lu epol ajokis kanu ngun ngesi awanyun ebe ejenete eswamak ebe ejokuka ido igangitai kes.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'bala 'yezu ewu andruri ma alea, adriza kililiru azi tia ri ma ezota eri orodriru 'ba talanta be 'diyi ma ta mbazu. E'yo azi okporu 'di ni ri lezu nezu ra kini azi'ba eyi ma aa orodriru azini eyi atita esu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu obw'okuhayahayana aha mirimo, okureetaho entwaza nungi aha mirimo n'eky'omugasho omu kusigaza etaraanta. Ekikuru omu kukora eki n'okureeba ngu abakozi bahurira baine omugasho n'obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: The economy has been facing significant challenges lately. Many individuals are struggling to find work, leading to a rise in joblessness.
lug_prompt: Eby'enfuna bibadde bisanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi ennaku zino. Abantu bangi balwana okunoonya emirimu, ekiviiriddeko ebbula ly'emirimu okweyongera.
ach_prompt: Tenge me lim obedo ka nongo peko madit tutwal ikare-ni. Dano mapol tye ka tute matek me nongo tic ma oweko can tic omede.
teo_prompt: Etereikina edumune loka ikapun keda atiokisio nuepolok apakio nu. Eutasi itunga luipu ainingosit adumun aswamisinei, ido eyangauni amamus na aswamisinei aiyatakin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia ni 'diyi ebi e'yo ewaru 'diyi esu curu'do. Ba karakara eyi dri ci azi esuzu eyini ani azi ako ma omgbo tuzu.
nyn_prompt: Eby'entaasya bitwire nibishanga oburemeezi bw'amaani ebiro ebi. Abantu baingi nibarwana kuronda emirimo, ekirikureetaho okweyongyera kw'eibura ry'emirimo.

eng_prompt: In today's economy, many individuals find themselves struggling to make ends meet. As a result, securing stable employment has become increasingly vital for their financial well-being.
lug_prompt: Mu by'enfuna by'ennaku zino, abantu bangi beesanga nga balwana okweyimirizaawo. N'ekivuddemu, okufuna emirimu egy'olubeerera kifuuse kikulu nnyo eri embeera yaabwe ey'eby'enfuna.
ach_prompt: I kare me can lim me kare-ni, dano mapol nongo tek tutwal me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi. Macalo adwogi ne, nongo tic maber dong odoko gin ma pire tek tutwal pi bedo ki lim.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loka ikapun loka lolo, etereikina itunga luipu keda aijar. Kanuka ngun, adumun aswamisinei nuegogong erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka aijar kec naka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lonyi ni curu'do 'diyi ma alea, 'ba karakara eyi eyi esu eyi dri ci afa eyini aa'zu 'diyi esuzu. E'yo 'disi, azi esuza kililiru ri eca curu'do orodriru eyini ani aa'zu muke e'yo robia nirisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'entaasya ebirikugyenda omu maisho, abantu baingi nibatunga oburemeezi bw'okureeberera amagara gaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, okutunga emirimo y'obutuura, nikyeyongyera kuba eky'omugasho omu by'entaasya yaabo.

eng_prompt: Many organizations implement structured work hours to enhance productivity and ensure that tasks are completed efficiently. This approach helps maintain a balance between work and personal life for their employees.
lug_prompt: Ebitongole bingi biteekawo essaawa z'emirimu ezitegekeddwa okwongera ku buwanguzi n'okukakasa nti emirimu giwedde bulungi. Enkola eno eyamba okukuuma enzikiriziganya wakati w'emirimu n'obulamu obw'obuntu eri abakozi baabwe.
ach_prompt: Dule mapol giyubu cawa me tic pi medo rwom me tic ki neno ni tic otum maber. Yoo man konyo lutic me gwoko rwom me tic ki kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Iriongeta luipu itemonokinete isawan lu iswamaere kanu aikeun eswamae ka awanyun ebe itodolikinete aswam ejok. Ingarakinit epone lo aidar eirian kiding aswam keda aijar naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Amuti karakara eyi sa'wa 'bani azi ngazu 'diyi 'ba sa'wa 'bani azi ngazu 'diyi ma alea eyini ani azi eyi ma dezu kililiru beni. Geri 'di ni fe azi'ba eyini aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa
nyn_prompt: Ebitongore ebingi nibiteekaho eshaaha z'okukoreramu, okureeba ngu emirimo ekorwa kurungi. Enkora egi neehwera abakozi kurinda oburinganiza ahagati y'emirimo n'amagara gaabo.

eng_prompt: In order to maintain productivity and meet company goals, it is essential for all team members to adhere to their scheduled shifts. This ensures that projects are completed on time and that collaboration among colleagues is effective.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukuuma ebikolebwa n'okutuukiriza ebiruubirirwa bya kampuni, kya mugaso eri bammemba ba ttiimu bonna okunywerera ku mirimu gyabwe egyateekebwawo. Kino kikakasa nti pulojekiti ziwedde mu budde n'enkolagana wakati wa bannamikago ekola bulungi.
ach_prompt: Me gwoko tic maber ki cobo miti pa dul ne, pire tek tutwal pi lumemba me dul tic me lubu kare gi me tic. Man neno ni yub weng otum ikare ki bene winye ikin lutic tye maber.
teo_prompt: Kanu aidar eswamae loajokan ka aitodolikin alosikineta nuka ekampuni, ejokuna itunga kere luka etimu aitodolikin aswamukec. Einakini ngin awanyun ebe engetanakinio ipurojektin kotoma apak ka aiswamanara kanejaas ipaupa.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza ma ta mbazu azini otita amuti ni 'diyi ma e'yo 'yezu, eri orodriru 'ba dria amuti ma alia 'diyini azi yini 'diyi 'yezu sa'wa yini 'diyi ma alia. Diri ne ra kini 'ba otita eyi de sa'wa dria dika ti ecita 'ba eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okugumizamu n'okukora n'okuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa bya kampuni, ni kikuru ba memba ba tiimu boona okukuratira enteekateeka yaabo. Eki nikihamya ngu purogyekiti nizimara omu bwire kandi ngu okukwatanisa omu bakozi bagyenzi baabo nikukora kurungi.

eng_prompt: In today's collaborative work environment, it is essential to involve team members in the strategic process. Their diverse perspectives and insights can significantly enhance the quality of decisions made.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera ya leero ey'okukolera awamu, kya mugaso okwetabyamu bammemba ba ttiimu mu nkola y'obukodyo. Endowooza zaabwe ez'enjawulo n'okutegeera bisobola okulongoosa ennyo omutindo gw'okusalawo okukolebwa.
ach_prompt: I kare me tic matye kombedi, pire tek tutwal me kelo lumemba me dul tic I yub mapat-pat mapat-pat. Tam gi mapat-pat twero medo rwom me moko tam ma kimoko.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loka aswam loimorikikina ilolo, ejokuna noi aimorikikin itunga luka etimu aswam iboro luibusakinit aswam. Iponesio kec luegelegela ka acoasineikec epedorete aitojokar adoketait na aseununeta nu iswamao.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza tualuri ma alia, eri orodriru 'ba amuti ma alia 'diyi suzu e'yo otita ni 'diyi ma alia indi. Egata eyini ndundu 'diyi azini ondua eyini 'diyi eco e'yo 'bani pe 'diyi ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu mirimo y'erizooba ey'okukorera hamwe, n'eky'omugasho okwetabamu ba memba ba tiimu omu kukora enteekateeka. Ebiteekateeko byabo ebitarikushushana nibibaasa kwongyera aha mutindo gw'ebiteiso ebikozirwe.

eng_prompt: In the competitive landscape of the market, companies strive to maximize their financial performance. To achieve sustainability and growth, organizations must focus on their revenue generation strategies.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi y'okuvuganya mu katale, amakampuni gakola butaweera okutumbula enkola yaago ey'ensimbi. Okusobola okutuuka ku buwangaazi n'okukulaakulana, ebitongole birina okussa essira ku nkola zaabyo ez'okufunamu ensimbi.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma pyem tye matek tutwal I cuk, dul mapat-pat tye ka yele me medo rwom me limgi. Pi dongo lobo, dul mapat-pat omyero guket cwinygi I kom yoo me nongo lim.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka esokoni, ekotosi ikampunin aitojokar eswamae kec loka ikapun. Kanu aitodolikin apol keda apol, ekot iriongeta apodokinit aitolomun ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo baka seza cuu ma alia 'diyi ma alia, amuti yi okpo 'ba geri yini ecozu robia esuzu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Aa'zu ewu drile ri ma alea tualu zota be, le amuti eyi ma 'ba asi geri eyini robia esuzu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'okuhayahayana omu katare, kampuni nizigyezaho kukora kurungi omu by'empiiha. Okuhikiiriza entunguuka n'entunguuka,ebitongore bishemereire kuta amaani omu kukora esente.

eng_prompt: The atmosphere in the office had grown increasingly tense as rumors of layoffs circulated. Many employees were left feeling anxious and uncertain about their future with the company.
lug_prompt: Embeera mu ofiisi yali yeeyongedde okuba ey'obunkenke ng'olugambo lw'okugoba abantu mu mirimu lutambula. Abakozi bangi baalekebwa nga beeraliikirivu era nga tebalina bukakafu ku biseera byabwe eby'omu maaso mu kampuni.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka medde I gang tic ne I kare ma lok angeya me kwanyo dano I tic ocako wot. Lutic mapol gubedo ki lworo tutwal I kom anyimgi I kampuni.
teo_prompt: Abu ejautene loka eyapiesi kiyatakin noi naarai apotu akiro nuka aitobwot itunga kotoma aswam. Aponi kojalakinai eswamak luipu aiyalongong ido mam ejenete nuikamunitos ingaren kec keda ekampuni.
lgg_prompt: Angu ofisi 'da ma alea ri eca ndra asi otiza ru e'yo 'bani 'ba ofuzu azi'a 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ni acizu risi. Azi'ba karakara eyi awi asi otiza be dika eyi aa ni e'yo eyi ma ewu drialeri ni amuti 'da be ri ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Embeera omu ofiisi ekaba eyeyongyeire kuba ey'obunkenke ahabw'orugambo rw'okwiha abantu omu mirimo yaabo. Abakozi baingi bakasigara baine okwerarikirira n'okwerarikirira aha biro byabo by'omumaisho omu kampuni.

eng_prompt: In many companies, the hiring process for informal positions lacks the structure and documentation found in formal employment. As a result, these employees often face abrupt dismissals without any official notice or agreement.
lug_prompt: Mu makampuni mangi, enkola y'okupangisa abantu mu bifo ebitali bya bulijjo terina nkola n'ebiwandiiko ebisangibwa mu mirimu emitongole. N'ekivuddemu, abakozi bano batera okugobebwa mu bwangu nga tebategeezeddwa oba nga tebakkiriziganyizza.
ach_prompt: I dul mapat-pat mapol, yub me coyo dano pi tic ma pe jenge I kom gamente peke ki yub ki coc ma nonge I tic matye I gamente. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic magi ipol kare ki ryemo gi atura labongo ngec onyo winye.
teo_prompt: Kokampunin luipu, epone loka aipagis itunga kanu aiboisio numam eraasi nuka apugan emamiatatar keda aiwadikaeta nuka aswam. Kanuka ngun, etapit duc eswamak lu airengear katipet komam alimor arai acamanar.
lgg_prompt: Amuti karakara eyi ma alea, e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi 'duzu pari azita palaa ku 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma sita azini kokobi 'bani isule azi ngaza azita palaa 'diyi ma alea 'diyi yo. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba 'diyi dri fu e'yo 'bani yi odrozu e'yo azita palaa ku 'diyi be.
nyn_prompt: Omu kampuni enyingi, enkora y'okupangisa abantu kukora emirimo etari ya buriijo, teine nkora n'ebihandiiko ebirikushangwa omu mirimo eya buriijo. N'ekyarugiremu, abakozi aba nibakira kubingwa omu bwire butari bwa buriijo bateine kirangiriro ky'omutaano nainga endagaano.

eng_prompt: After careful consideration of my current projects and commitments, I have decided to stay in my position. The support from my team and the progress we've made motivate me to continue my work.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo ku pulojekiti zange n'obuvunaanyizibwa bwe nnina kati, nsazeewo okusigala mu kifo kyange. Obuwagizi okuva mu ttiimu yange n'enkulaakulana gye tukoze binkubiriza okugenda mu maaso n'omulimu gwange.
ach_prompt: Ingee tam matut I kom yub ma atye kwede kombedi, dong amoko tamma me medde ki ticca. Cwak ma aa ki bot luticca kacel ki dongo lobo ma watimo cuku cwinya me mede ki ticca.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aomoom ejok nuikamunitos ipurojektin ka aswamisinei ka, aseunit eong asalakin toma adoketait ka. Agangat naka etimuka keda apolou na iswamat sio isinyikokit eong ainyikokin aswamuka.
lgg_prompt: Mani e'yo ma vile otita sawa 'disi 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, asi 'du e'yo mani ovuzu pari mavileri ma alia. Atita engazu amuti mavileri vu tualu zota amani esu 'diyi pie ri ni ma eka muzu azi mavileri be drile.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma kurungi purogyekiti zangye ezi nyine obwahati, nshaziremu kuguma omu ntebe yangye. Obushagiki kuruga omu tiimu yangye hamwe n'entunguuka ei tukozire, nibinyongyera amaani g'okugumizamu n'omurimo gwangye.

eng_prompt: As the year comes to a close, it's important to recognize the hard work and dedication of your team. A celebration would not only boost morale but also strengthen team bonds.
lug_prompt: Omwaka bwe gugenda guggwaako, kya mugaso okusiima omulimu n'obumalirivu bwa ttiimu yo. Okujaguza tekukoma ku kutumbula mpisa naye era kunyweza enkolagana ya ttiimu.
ach_prompt: Ka mwaka woto ki tum, pire tek tutwal me pwoyo tic matek ki keto cwiny pa lutic megi. Yub me kwero nino enoni pe bi medo rwom me kwo pa lutuku keken ento bene obi jingo wat ikin lutuku.
teo_prompt: Kwape elosi ekaru angetakin, ejokuna ajenun aswam na aswam ka ainakina naka etimukon. Mam ainumunum ebuni aitogogong iponesio luka etimu bon konye aitogogong aiswamanara naka etimu.
lgg_prompt: Eli ni ecazu i deria, eri orodriru azi ngaza okporu azini asi feza amuti mivileri niri ma e'yo egazu. Omu 'da ni nga lu 'ba eyi ma adriza otu ku te eyi ma eselea eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otu indi.
nyn_prompt: Omwaka ku gurikuza kuhwa, n'eky'omugasho okusiima okukora n'amaani n'okwehayo kwa tiimu yaawe. Omukoro gw'okujaguza tigurikwija kwongyera aha mitwarize y'abateezi b'ebigyere kyonka, beitu nigureetera n'omukago gw'abateezi b'ebigyere kweyongyera.

eng_prompt: Every individual deserves the opportunity to pursue their career aspirations. It is essential to recognize the fundamental rights that empower people in the workforce.
lug_prompt: Buli muntu asaana aweebwe omukisa okutuuka ku biruubirirwa bye eby'omulimu. Kya mugaso okutegeera eddembe ery'omusingi eriwa abantu amaanyi mu bakozi.
ach_prompt: Dano weng omyero gunong gum me cobo miti gi. Pire tek tutwal me niang twero ma pire tek ma weko lutic bedo ki kero.
teo_prompt: Ibusakinit nginitunganan adumun arerengu na aitodolikin aswamuke. Erai ibore yenepol noi aijen apedorosio nu isinyikokitos itunga aswam.
lgg_prompt: Le 'ba dria ma esu drileba afa eyini le 'diyi esuzu. Eri orodriru 'bani drilemgbo okporu 'ba azi ngapi 'diyi dri okpo fepi 'diyi ma e'yo egazu.
nyn_prompt: Buri muntu ashemereire kutunga omugisha gw'okukora ebi arikwenda. N'eky'omugasho kumanya obugabe oburikuhwera abakozi.

eng_prompt: As the global market continues to fluctuate, many companies are struggling to adapt to changing consumer demands. This has raised concerns about the sustainability of their operations and profitability.
lug_prompt: Nga akatale k'ensi yonna bwe kasigala kakyuka, amakampuni mangi galwana okutuukana n'ebyetaago by'abaguzi ebikyuka. Kino kireeseewo okweraliikirira ku buwangaazi bw'emirimu gyabwe n'amagoba.
ach_prompt: Kit ma cuk me wilobo tye ka lokke kwede, dul mapat-pat tye ka yele me timo jami ma luwil mito. Man okelo lworo I kom medde pa ticgi ki nongo magoba.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos aijulanakineta nuka esokoni loka akwap kere, eutasi ikampunin luipu ainingosit aitodolikin eipuda loka agwelak. Eyangaunit ngin aiyalongong kanu aijar naka aswamukec keda ameda.
lgg_prompt: Cu wudrikurusiri ni mu drile ojata ma alia, amuti karakara eyi dri ci e'yo 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi ni le 'diyi ojazu. E'yo 'di eji asi otiza e'yo 'yeta yini 'diyi ma ta mbazuri ma dria tualu orodri yini 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku akatare k'ensi yoona karikugumizamu n'okuhinduka, kampuni nyingi ziriyo niziteganisibwa kuhikaana n'ebyetengo by'abaguzi ebirikuhinduka. Eki kireesireho okwerarikirira aha ku emirimo yaabo erikubaasa kugumaho n'amagoba gaayo.

eng_prompt: In order to ensure a smooth transition and maintain good relations, it is important to establish clear communication regarding employment status. Therefore, a four weeks notice should be given to employees before termination.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa enkyukakyuka ennungi n'okukuuma enkolagana ennungi, kikulu okuteekawo empuliziganya ennambulukufu ku mbeera y'emirimu. N'olw'ekyo, abakozi balina okutegeezebwa wiiki nnya nga tebannagobwa.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni aloka-loka tye maber dok winye tye maber, pire tek tutwal me nywako lok maber I kom kit ma tic tye kwede. Pi meno, omyero kimii ngec me cabit angwen bot lutic mapwod pe ki juku tic gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna aijulanakineta kosodete aidar eidicane loajokan, ejokuna aitolomun einer lo ecai loikamunit ejautene loka aswam. Kanuka ngun, ekot aitijenar eswamak isabitin iwongon eringa elemar eswamak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ojazu kililiru azini aa'ta muke ri ma ta mbazu, eri orodriru e'yo nzeza kililiru 'diyi e'dozu e'yo azi ni 'diyi ma dria. Ka'dini, le 'ba ma fe azi'ba eyini o'duko sabiti su si de nga po'di 'ba dro eyi azia ku.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu habaho empindahinduka nungi, n'eky'omugasho okugira empurizagana nungi aha bikwatiraine n'emirimo. N'ahabw'ekyo, abakozi bashemereire kumanyisibwa esande ina batakabemereize.
